content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. To get started, may I have your name, please?
It's Sara. I just need a plumber to fix a leaking sink. How much would that even cost?
Thank you, Sara! I'd be happy to help with your leaking sink. Can you please provide your address so I can ensure we service your location and provide a more accurate estimate?
Great, thank you! You're within our service area. When would you ideally like us to come take a look at your sink? Please let me know a day and time that works for you.
Tomorrow morning would be best. Preferably before noon.
Thank you! I'll check our availability for tomorrow morning before noon.
Hmm, I'm having trouble checking our calendar at the moment. Let me get a human team member to help confirm availability for your requested time.

Hi Sara, this is Joe from XYZ. Sorry for the delay and any frustration. We do have a plumber available tomorrow morning before noon. There is a $79 service call fee, and our plumber can provide a full estimate on site before work begins. Would you like me to confirm your appointment for 10:00 AM?
That's fine. 10 works. Please go ahead and book it. Thanks.

Youâ€™re all set, Sara. Our plumber will be at 1725 Ashwood Drive tomorrow at 10:00 AM. You'll get a call ahead when the technician is on the way. Let us know if you need to reschedule or have any questions. Thank you for choosing XYZ!
